template_input_params.name: service_name
template_input_params.description: Give a name to the service that will be created
template_input_params.label: Service name

template_input_params.name: cf_org
template_input_params.description: Name of Cloud Foundry Org to create service in
template_input_params.label: Cloud Foundry Org

template_input_params.name: cf_space
template_input_params.description: Name of Cloud Foundry Space to create service in
template_input_params.label: Cloud Foundry Space

template_output_params.name: service_name
template_output_params.label: Service name
template_output_params.description: Name of created blockchain platform instance

template_output_params.name: service_id
template_output_params.label: Service ID
template_output_params.description: ID of created blockchain platform instance

template_output_params.name: url
template_output_params.label: URL
template_output_params.description: URL of console page for service
